name: Wisp (blank_games)
description:
Created for WGJ #144 In The Dark.

This is the first game I have ever made.

There are 17 lights in total. When you lose the light, while technically possible to find it in the dark, you should reload the browser(there is no reset)

The game turned out much more  punishing than expected.

If somebody gets to the end please share what your experience was!

I hope You enjoy it!
